paragraphs: A web developer based north of London with a unique journey from electronics and technical systems to web development. My transition from being a Senior Technical Officer to a Web Developer at the University of Hertfordshire has given me a distinctive perspective on problem-solving and technical implementation.

My background in electronics, network systems, and hardware provides me with a deep understanding of how systems work at a fundamental level. This technical foundation, combined with my passion for creating engaging digital experiences, allows me to approach web development with both creativity and technical precision.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, working on side projects, or delivering good vibes wherever I go. I believe in creating web experiences that are not just functional, but genuinely enjoyable to use.
about.name: Thanasis Theo
